pages.title: Farming At Home
pages.text: Some plants can be a bit confusing to use at first. Thankfully people in the Villages have passed on their knowledge of the Old Ones and their farming methods to me.

pages.title: Mulch
pages.text: Made with 9 saplings, Mulch can be used to create more soil for farming on.

pages.title: Soil
pages.text: Made with 4 Mulch as a renewable form of dirt.

pages.title: Turf
pages.text: Turf can be used to spread grass to places it normally wouldn't be possible, such as underground!

pages.title: Seedlings
pages.text: Grown on dirt next to water, they are easy to reproduce using Bone Meal and Water with their crop.
